title: Barium: A Cause of the Loco-Weed Disease
author: Crawford, Albert C. (Albert Cornelius), 1869-1921

quoteFirst: In some respects the attack was peculiar. As was so often the case, the direction of the attack was at an angle to our front, and the London Scottish, starting the assault from the right at 1.45 p.m., were followed by the 4th London Regt. at 1.47 and the Rangers at
quoteLast: ; this was calculated to bring the three battalions into line by the time Dewdrop and the gun-pits were reached.
title: The 56th Division (1st London Territorial Division)
author: Dudley Ward, C. H. (Charles Humble), 1879-1945; Horne, Henry, 1861-1929 [Author of introduction, etc.]
